flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: So, you want a good painting technique that is easy and looks like a professional paint job? Well then this weekend project is sure to please any rocker who wants to jazz up some equipment.
guide.introduction_rendered:
So, you want a good painting technique that is easy and looks like a professional paint job? Well then this weekend project is sure to please any rocker who wants to jazz up some equipment.

Relevant parts
  • Speaker box shelves whatever you want to paint!
Tools
  • Painter's tape
  • Screw drivers
  • Spray paint

parts.text: Speaker box shelves whatever you want to paint!

lines.text: The first step is to be sure you have all your materials, a clean surface to paint on, and something to paint. For this demostration I have choosen to paint the pickgaurd off of my bass guitar.
lines.text_raw: The first step is to be sure you have all your materials, a clean surface to paint on, and something to paint. For this demostration I have choosen to paint the pickgaurd off of my bass guitar.

guide.summary: This is an easy weekend project that gives a rockstar theme to any boring surface.
guide.title: Custom Paint for Any Rockstar
